description.descriptionTitle: You'll fall in love with me at the first sight
description.description1: Honor your parents. Don't lie to them, and don't do any sneaky stuff, because they know what you're doing anyway, there's no way around it. Help them to build a wall of trust for you, but when you get it, don't let it fall down again!
description.description2: "The more you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you’ll go."―Dr. Seuss
